mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLUS_TIME(PTIME_NO, CHECK_NO, TITLE, TIME) VALUES(PLSTIMESEQ.NEXTVAL, #{checkNo}, #{timeTitle}, #{time})
INSERT INTO PLUS_SCORE((PSCORE_NO, CHECK_NO, TITLE, SCORENO) VALUES(PLSSCORESEQ.NEXTVAL, #{checkNo}, #{scoreTitle}, #{scoreNo})
mapper.select: SELECT PTIME_NO, CHECK_NO, TITLE, COMMENTS, TIME FROM PLUS_TIME WHERE PTIME_NO= #{plusTimeNo}
SELECT PSCORE_NO, CHECK_NO, TITLE, COMMENTS, SCORENO FROM PLUS_SCORE WHERE PSCORE_NO= #{plusScoreNo}
SELECT CHECK_NO FROM ( SELECT CHECK_NO, CHECKDATE, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CHECKDATE DESC) AS FAST FROM CHECKLIST WHERE AC_NO=#{acNo} )T WHERE T.FAST =1
SELECT MAX(PTIME_NO) FROM PLUS_TIME WHERE CHECK_NO = (SELECT CHECK_NO FROM CHECKLIST WHERE CHECK_NO = #{checkNo})
SELECT MAX(PSCORE_NO) FROM PLUS_SCORE WHERE CHECK_NO = (SELECT CHECK_NO FROM CHECKLIST WHERE CHECK_NO = #{checkNo})
